text: Afei, Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ, “Sɛ mpo, Mose ne Samuel15.1 Mose ne Samuel. Wɔgyee din ɛfiri sɛ wɔdii ntam maa Israel nnebɔneyɛfoɔ no wɔ Awurade anim. (2 Mose 32.11-14,30-34; 4 Mose 14.13-23; 5 Mose 9.18-20,25-29; 1 Sam 7.5-9; 12.19-25; Nnw 99.6-8). bɛgyinaa mʼanim a, mʼakoma rentɔ nkɔ saa nnipa yi so. Ma wɔmfiri mʼani so! Ma wɔnkɔ!
